Text: Thank You right on time, Hey Test_Verify can you please try to find me a Fix 3.55 for Ratchet and Clank Collection US version the works without an internet connection being on.

I cannot get this to work. I have 3.55 KMEAW and I don't have internet on PS3 so I downloaded the update manually and installed it. I do it exactly as the instructions listed? So I install the patch then overwrite eboot and it should be working?
